program_purpose: This program reduces or eliminates the pollution of water resources by funding eligible organizations that provide technical assistance or training to improve planning for – and management of – solid waste disposal sites.
applicant_requirement_proven_ability: Proven ability, background, or experience to successfully complete a project similar to the one proposed
applicant_requirement_legal_authority: Legal authority and capacity to provide technical assistance or training
matching_funds_encouraged_contributions: Applicant and in-kind contributions are encouraged

governance_regulation_1_description: 7 CFR 1775 in the Code of Federal Regulations
governance_regulation_2_description: Section 310B of the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act
program_purpose_question: Why does USDA Rural Development do this?
program_purpose_answer: This program helps small communities and utilities better manage solid waste disposal.
note_text: Because information changes, always consult official program instructions or contact your local Rural Development office for help. A list is available at this link: https://go.usa.gov/xJHPE. You will find additional resources, forms, and program information at https://rd.usda.gov. USDA is an equal opportunity provider, employer, and lender.
